title: Declining rates, Korea exclusion from EM index, domestic growth to flock FPIs back to India: Nilesh Shah
description:
Nilesh Shah, CEO, Kotak Mahindra AMC

Foreign institutional investors will be back with a bang over the course of new Samvat, believes Nilesh Shah, managing director at Kotak Mahindra Asset Management. In a conversation with Moneycontrol, he said that declining interest rates globally will release f...
